dm.start: We continue creating the event in private.

askChannel.prompt:
📢 What channel do you want to post the event?
{{channels}}
askChannel.noChannels: ❌ There is no channel where the bot can post.

askTitle.prompt: 📝 What's the title of the event? (max 50 chars)

askDescription.prompt: 💬 Ahort description (max 300 chars), or `-` if there is nothin:
askDescription.tooLong: ❌ The description is too long. I quit..

askOptions.intro:
📜 Available roles:
{{roleList}}

Provide options in the following format:
`option text | role | max attendees`
. Write `Done` when you're ready.
askOptions.emptyLabel: ⚠️ Option text can not be empty.
askOptions.duplicateLabel: ⚠️ The option already exists. Provide with a new one.
askOptions.invalidMax: ⚠️ Max attendees should be a positive number.

post.success: ✅ The event is pusblished successfully in **#{{channel}}** channel!

error.eventAlreadyStarted: ⏰ This event has already started. You can't apply to this.
error.missingRole: ❌ You don't have the necessarry role to choose this option.
error.optionFull: ❌ This option is reached maximum ({{max}}) attendees.
error.invalidChannel: ❌ The chosen channel can not be found.
error.noResponse: ❌ There is no response. I quit.

console.registeringCommands: 📦 Slash command registering is in progress...
console.saveError: ❌ This file can not be saved:
